description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 6 parts A and B (Tree Protection Measures) as attached to planning permission reference 18399/APP/2022/411 dated 03/05/2023 (Installation of plant and equipment to unit DC6 including external plant equipment, external louvres and associated security fencing and landscaping, to facilitate use of the building as a data centre).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: This application permits the partial discharge of Condition 6 parts A and B (Tree Protection Measures) as attached to planning permission reference 18399/APP/2022/411. Part C requires that tree protection measures for the site will be monitored and supervised by an arboricultural consultant at the key stages of the development and that records of the site inspections / meetings shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority. Accordingly, the discharge and approval of Part C will require a separate application submission.
